title: Marwa Arsanios: Who is Afraid of Ideology? Part 4: Reverse Shot
short_description: The latest chapter of Arsanios's video series Who Is Afraid of Ideology?, this video uses a range of visual techniques—from fantastical animation to worm’s-eye-view camera work—to document an attempt to extricate a parcel of land from the construct of ownership.
suggest_autocomplete_boosted: Marwa Arsanios: Who is Afraid of Ideology? Part 4: Reverse Shot

input: Marwa Arsanios: Who is Afraid of Ideology? Part 4: Reverse Shot
